description:
With recycled synthetic insulation and vibrant hues, the Teca Cálido Hooded Jacket keeps your core warm and your trail style strong.
Elastic binding on the hood, hem, and cuffs keeps the warmth in, while two pockets keep your hands toasty. Also available in women’s.
name: Cotopaxi Teca Calido Reversible Hooded Jacket - Mens

specs.value: Repurposed Polyester Taffeta with DWR Finish and 600 mm PU Backer
